directions: Heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat and cook mushrooms until they are soft and mushroom juice has reduced, 5 to 10 minutes. Season with salt and pepper. Stir in garlic and cook for 2 minutes. Add white wine and cook for 1 minute. Stir in dill and parsley.
ingredients: salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste
title: Cooked Mushroom Salad
